title: Rise of the Dark Ones
description: Elvenkind Trilogy: Have you ever wondered how an elven race could get divided into several sub-races? This is one version, spanning millennia in a world where only elves live.Book 1: In a world where elves live in tranquil and enlightenment, no one could have known that a single boyâ€™s desire to live, could lead to so much death and suffering.Links to retailers: www.NixenFantasy.com
